lead_paragraph: Sirius XM has scheduled a news conference for Tuesday to announce the signing of the talk radio host Chris Russo. Russo, who left New York’s WFAN last week, was unavailable for comment and his agent would not comment on the move.
snippet: Sirius XM has scheduled a news conference for Tuesday to announce the signing of the talk radio host Chris Russo. Russo, who left New York’s WFAN last week, was unavailable for comment and his agent would not comment on the move.
